lead_paragraph: Manchester City manager Manuel Pellegrini has rejected the notion that the club's announcement that Pep Guardiola will take over at the end of the season has derailed their campaign.

headline.print_headline: Guardiola Appointment Not Behind City's Slump-Pellegrini
headline.main: Guardiola Appointment Not Behind City's Slump-Pellegrini

snippet: Manchester City manager Manuel Pellegrini has rejected the notion that the club's announcement that Pep Guardiola will take over at the end of the season has derailed their campaign....
